mapper.insert: insert into user_info (userId, userPwd, userName, userEmail, userPhone, userGender, userCountry) values (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userGender}, #{userCountry})
mapper.select: select userpwd from user_info where userid like #{userId}

select.if:
select username, userid, userpwd, useremail, userphone, usergender, usercountry from user_info where 1=1
and userid like #{userId}

mapper.update:
update user_info set username = #{userName}, userpwd=#{userPwd}, usercountry=#{userCountry}, useremail=#{userEmail}, userphone=#{userPhone}
where userid=#{userId}
